attributes.action: ensure that summer is longer, warmer and more enjoyable for the good citizens of this great country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is far too cold far too soon.   The government should establish an all party summer steering group to ensure that summer is longer, sunnier and warmer thus creating a happier workforce who will work longer, harder and more productively.  This will drive down debt, increase our GDP, put smiles on our faces and generally improve the standard of living.  Really.  Promise.  Life is too short to live in the dark and to be perpetually grumpy.  Let the sun shine in, let the sun shine on.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
